availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Educated at Princeton and Transylvania University. Worked as a lawyer. Commissioned a brigadier general and removed from command in 1864. Married to Elizabeth Anderson in 1842.

bibl.p:
Ross A. Webb, "Jeremiah T. Boyle," in John E. Kleber, ed.,The Kentucky Encyclopedia (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 109.
Zachariah Frederick Smith, The History of Kentucky: From Its Earliest Discovery and Settlement, to the Present Date ... Its Military Events and Achievements, and Biographic Mention of Its Historic Characters (Louisville: Courier-Journal Job Printing Company, 1892), 637-641.
